titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Energy to undertake a study of the need for and feasibility of establishing a strategic natural gas reserve.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 3/29/2006--Introduced. Instructs the Secretary of Energy to study and report to Congress on the need for and feasibility of establishing a strategic natural gas reserve similar to the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
